src:
Jelang Maulid, Harga Buah di Sampang Naik
07 Nov 2019, 12:39 by Khairul Umam


Jelang Maulid, Harga Buah di Sampang Naik

KBRN, Sampang : Menjelang perayaan Maulid nabi harga buah di Kabupaten Sampang naik signifikan, seperti harga buah apel dari 12 ribu kini naik 18 ribu per kilogramnya, anggur dari 30 ribu menjadi 40 ribu perkilogram, buah klengkeng dari 30 ribu menjadi 35 ribu ruoiah perkilo gramnya.
Menurut Zainuddin salah satu pedagang buah di pasar tradisional Sampang, naiknya harga buah karena moment maulid nabi permintaan banyak dan stok menipis, sehingga terjadi kenaikan.
"Kenaikan harga buah terjadi sejak 1 pekan lalu, dan ia memprediksi pada 3 hari kedepan harganya juga kembali akan mengalami kenaikan," ungkapnya, Kamis (07/11/2019).
Sementara itu diungkapkan Kasi Informasi perdagangan Disperindagtam Sampang, Busar Wibisono mengatakan untuk harga kebutuhan pokok di sejumlah pasar tradisional belum terjadi kenaikan yang signifikan.
"Seperti harga telur tetap harganya 20 ribu, harga daging ayam kampung dari 60 ribu naik 65 ribu perkilo gram, daging sapi tetap 117 ribu perkilo gram serta cabe rawit dari 39 ribu turun menjadi 35 ribu perkilo gramnya," jelasnya.
Dijelaskannya tidak terjadi kenaikan pada kebutuhan pokok karena stok masih banyak serta permintaan di pasaran masih belum melonjak. "Prediksi kebuthan pokok akan mengalami kenaikan 2 hari kedepan pada sat moment maulid nabi," tandasnya
text:
Ahead of Mawlid, Fruit Prices in Sampang Rise
Nov 7 2019, 12:39 by Khairul Umam


Ahead of Mawlid, Fruit Prices in Sampang Rise

KBRN, Sampang: Ahead of the prophet's birthday, the price of fruit in Sampang Regency rose significantly, as the price of apples from 12 thousand now rose 18 thousand per kilogram, grapes from 30 thousand to 40 thousand per kilogram, longan from 30 thousand to 35 thousand ruoiah per kilo gram .
According to Zainuddin, one of the fruit traders in the Sampang traditional market, the increase in the price of fruit was due to the moment of the birthday of the Prophet's high demand and thinning stock, resulting in an increase.
"The increase in fruit prices has occurred since 1 week ago, and he predicts that in the next 3 days the price will also increase again," he said, Thursday (11/07/2019).
Meanwhile disclosed the Head of Trade Information Disperindagtam Sampang, Busar Wibisono said for the price of basic necessities in a number of traditional markets there has not been a significant increase.
"As the price of eggs remains the price of 20 thousand, the price of native chicken meat from 60 thousand rose to 65 thousand per kilo gram, beef remained 117 thousand per kilo gram and cayenne pepper from 39 thousand dropped to 35 thousand per kilo gram," he explained.
He explained that there was no increase in basic needs because there were still many stocks and demand on the market had not surged. "Prediction of basic needs will increase in the next 2 days at the moment of the Prophet's birthday," he said
